course_description: This course examines the physiology/pathophysiology underlying many of the conditions and diseases occurring across the lifespan. Students will recognize and analyze the relationship between normal physiology and pathophysiologic changes in cells/tissues/organs that underlie selected diseases.
sections: Class Nbr: 5213, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
